title: Peek-A-Boo: Russian Soldier Caught Ukrainian Drone
cleaned_text:
A Russian soldier managed to catch a Ukrainian drone that attempted to hit him with a bomb.

The incident took place in a wooded area on the Ukrainian front line. The video, reportedly shot by a Ukrainian drone, shows that the operator tried to hit a Russian soldier with an explosive device, but failed to harm him. In his turn, the Russian soldier pretended to be dead or wounded and laid on the ground, waiting for the drone to approach him. When the Ukrainian operator lowered the device to assess the damage, the Russian serviceman jumped up, caught the drone and crashed it.
